programme.title: Second Sight Paranormal
programme.desc: "Everyone wants to own a haunted house until they become the haunted" Newly listed and underpriced, the Finch house stands out as a buyer's dream. The picturesque Victorian home is marred with tragedy, deaths, and ghostly activity. Even after an exorcism, many believed the estate cannot be sold. A paranormal team is called to bring peace to the home. They soon discover something sinister and uninvited lying in wait.”

programme.title: Cryptid Wilds S01 E02
programme.desc: The search for Big Foot takes these two adventures into the wilderness, as they document their journey to find the mythological creature

programme.title: Dark Echoes Paranormal
programme.desc: Dark Echoes Paranormal investigates Twisted Vines restaurant in Derby, CT, with medium Shannon Collins. They encounter eerie whispers, unexplained footsteps, and capture EVPs. Spirits are present, seeking attention, not harm. Tune in to see if the restaurant is truly haunted!

programme.title: Sir Spooks
programme.sub-title: Scary Videos You Should NOT Watch At Midnight
programme.desc: Analysis and presentations of scary videos featuring ghosts, creatures and other mysterious subjects.

programme.title: Mind Control Exposed
programme.desc: In the remote reaches of the Alaskan North Slope lies a place of scientific intrigue and controversy: HAARP, which ventures into the realm of mind control, utilizing high frequency signals to influence behavior. But beyond Earthly boundaries, the conversation expands. Could extraterrestrial beings hold the key to unlocking the mysteries of the mind?

programme.title: Second Sight Paranormal
programme.desc: "Everyone wants to own a haunted house until they become the haunted" Newly listed and underpriced, the Finch house stands out as a buyer's dream. The picturesque Victorian home is marred with tragedy, deaths, and ghostly activity. Even after an exorcism, many believed the estate cannot be sold. A paranormal team is called to bring peace to the home. They soon discover something sinister and uninvited lying in wait.”

programme.title: Aliens Uncovered
programme.desc: With the recent release of Alien bodies at the Mexico disclosure event, we have to revisit the questions of alien visitation and the Mayan civilization. This doc explore an avenue you don't see on the popular shows.

programme.title: Conspiracy
programme.desc: Conspiracy is a video documentary series that explores the dark and controversial stories behind history's most well-known conspiracies. The series aims to take a neutral position on very polarizing topics while helping viewers uncover the truth.

programme.title: Morris's Paranormal Adventures UK
programme.desc: In this episode, we venture into this extremely haunted location known for its ghostly figure of a 7ft tall dark entity wearing a top hat and chasing the locals out.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: After 1066, William the Conqueror established the mark of his authority in every important place, and the town of Wisbech, at that time on the sea, was deemed worthy of a stone fortress. In 1236, both Town and Castle were swept away in a terrible inundation. The castle remained in ruins for the better half of a century, and then was rebuilt and became one of ten castles, palaces and manor houses attached to the See of Ely. In the times of persecution, Wisbech Castle became a state ecclesiastical prison, incarcerating Catholics in the reigns of Elizabeth, James I and Charles I and Protestants in that of Queen Mary. Many were executed. It is possible even that the Gunpowder Plot was hatched at the Castle. Since Wisbech was a Cromwellian area, the Castle, by now in a state of terminal dilapidation, was sold in 1658 to the Right Honourable John Thurloe, Cromwell’s Secretary of State. He had the ruined castle demolished and replaced it by a most elegant house designed by Peter Mills, a pupil of Inigo Jones. At the Restoration, Thurloe’s Mansion reverted to the See of Ely and was occupied by members of the Southwell family over a period of a hundred and five years. Then in 1792 it was put up for sale, and purchased by Joseph Medworth, a former Wisbech Charity boy who had succeeded in business. He offered it for sale to the Corporation for the use of the Grammar School, but they declined. Medworth had the Mansion demolished. Using much of the same materials, he managed to replace it with the regency villa, which stands today.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: A short history of mind control experimentation beginning with the Nazis through to the CIA’s infamous MK Ultra program. Richard speaks with several researchers and investigators about their claims that several infamous assassins, such as Lee Harvey Oswald, Sirhan Sirhan and Mark David Chapman, were not criminally responsible for their acts, but were either programmed killers or programmed to take the fall.

programme.title: Anunnaki
programme.desc: A review of scientific research that looks back on mankind’s ancestors, who are said to have descended from a heavenly realm to create human beings.

programme.title: Unveiled
programme.desc: Embark on an enthralling journey with "Unveiled," a captivating TV series exploring the enigmatic world of aliens, UFOs, conspiracy theories, and extraterrestrial history. Each episode unveils astonishing encounters, hidden truths, and thought-provoking revelations that challenge reality itself. Discover a thrilling blend of scientific exploration, historical analysis, and captivating storytelling as "Unveiled" pushes the boundaries of human understanding and leaves audiences captivated by the mysteries of the universe.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: The team travelled over to the united states of America to investigate one of two properties. In this episode S.P.I investigate Hinsdale house. Said to be one of Americas most haunted buildings, will the team discover what lurks within the shadows? come with them on a journey of pure fright.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: The team investigate an old farmhouse on the outskirts of Manchester in the North west of England.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: Part 2 The team investigate an old farmhouse on the outskirts of Manchester in the North west of England.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: The Team Head down south towards the Haunted Museum in Hinkley UK

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: Part 2 The Team Head down south towards the Haunted Museum in Hinkley UK

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: This is part 1 of 2. The team continue investigating on the land of Heskin Hall. On this episode the guys are in Heskin Hall itself. This building is not for the faint hearted, rich in a dark history dating all the way back to the doomsday book. Follow them and see what they capture!

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: Part 2 of the teams investigation at Heskin Hall. This episode is centred around the aftermath of Julie's experience. The team continued on with the evening without Julie due to how traumatised she was. Enjoy! and don't forget to hit that subscribe button for more content like this.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: On this episode the team investigate the RSS Discovery, RRS Discovery is a barque-rigged auxiliary steamship built in Dundee, Scotland for Antarctic research. Launched in 1901, she was the last traditional wooden three-masted ship to be built in the United Kingdom. Her first mission was the British National Antarctic Expedition, carrying Robert Falcon Scott and Ernest Shackleton on their first, and highly successful, journey to the Antarctic, known as the Discovery Expedition.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.sub-title: Milntown Estate and Gardens Isle of Man
programme.desc: Known throughout the isle of man as its most haunted house, Milntown estate offers a broad and intriguing glimpse into another world. The home is said to be haunted by several members of the Edwards family of which where the last owners of the estate.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: The team investigate Southport's Royal arcade. Located on Lord street Southport many ghostly tales originate from this building.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: On this episode the team uncover some strange goings on in the Park hotel in Morecambe North West of England.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: On this episode the team investigate the RSS Discovery, RRS Discovery is a barque-rigged auxiliary steamship built in Dundee, Scotland for Antarctic research. Launched in 1901, she was the last traditional wooden three-masted ship to be built in the United Kingdom. Her first mission was the British National Antarctic Expedition, carrying Robert Falcon Scott and Ernest Shackleton on their first, and highly successful, journey to the Antarctic, known as the Discovery Expedition.

programme.title: Sleep Paralysis and the Phenomenon of the Shadow People
programme.sub-title: Sleep Paralysis and the Phenomenon of the Shadow People
programme.desc: Millions of people suffer from the curious condition known as sleep paralysis. Not being able to move or speak after waking, many have also reported seeing otherworldly phenomena while in this state. Join us as we talk to three such people as they share with us the terror they live with on a nightly basis. Complete with stunning re-enactments, we shall attempt to shed light on this non-treatable and incurable condition.

programme.title: Scary Stories: My Night with a Skinwalker
programme.sub-title: Scary Stories: My Night with a Skinwalker
programme.desc: A terrifying collection of three real-life paranormal stories. Witness a terrifying tale from a man who comes face to face with a Skinwalker, a boy who sees the dead, and a couple with a haunting experience at the infamous Villisca Axe Murder House.

programme.title: Is It Haunted?
programme.desc: This is part 1 of the teams investigation into Heskin Hall Shopping Village. Right from the get go, the team uncovered some interesting evidence. So much so one of the members couldn't make it through the night.
